titles: The lives and characters of the English dramatick poets also an exact account of all the plays that were ever yet printed in the English tongue, their double titles, the places where acted, the dates when printed, and the persons to whom dedicated, with remarks and observations on most of the said plays / first begun by Mr. Langbain ; improv'd and continued down to this time, by a careful hand.
author: Langbaine, Gerard, 1656-1692.
Gildon, Charles, 1665-1724.
publisher: Printed for Tho. Leigh ... and William Turner ...,
notes: "A careful hand" is Charles Gildon. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
keywords: English drama --  Early modern and Elizabethan, 1500-1600 --  Bio-bibliography.
